casebody.data:
No. D-2479. In the Matter of Discipline of Irwin B. Seligsohn. 561 U.S. 1044, 131 S. Ct. 41,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1131,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5611. July 26, 2010.

Irwin B. Seligsohn, of West Orange, New Jersey, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
